item.title: SMI traffic split on Linkerd2
item.description: SMI Traffic split with Linkerd2 This year I had the opportunity to speak at the KubeCon Barcelona. It was my first KubeCon and my first big talk abroad. I’m going to let the youtube video here: But this post it’s not about it, sorry for the personal marketing. Back in track, on this KubeCon was announced the Service Mesh Interface (SMI). “A standard interface for service meshes on Kubernetes” as its slogan says.
